diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS rbcmessaging_message ( `message_id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `content` varchar(600) default '', `destination` varchar(255) default '', `recipient` int(11) default NULL, `date` datetime default NULL, `send_attempts` int(3) default 0, `status` int(4) default NULL, `uuid` char(38) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`message_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
